titles.title: Flight Sharing Freedom Act
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to add a definition for the term "common carrier", and for other purposes.
Flight Sharing Freedom Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Flight Sharing Freedom Act
This bill directs the Department of Transportation to issue or revise regulations to ensure that a pilot who holds a pilot certificate may communicate with the public, in any manner, to facilitate an aircraft flight for which the pilot and passengers share aircraft operating expenses.
Additionally, the bill excludes from common carrier regulations pilots who wish to coordinate flights and share aircraft operating expenses with passengers.
